FuncDef: The service-scheme command creates a service scheme and displays the service scheme view. The undo service-scheme command deletes a service scheme. By default, no service scheme is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces or the following symbols: /, \, :, *, ?, ", <, >, and |. The value cannot be - or --.

ExtraInfo: A service scheme is used to manage user authorization information in a unified manner.
